author: Special Correspondent
text:
Heels on Wheels - an all-women four-wheel treasure hunt - will be held in the city on Sunday as part of the International Women’s Day celebrations.

The event is organised by The Hindu and The Indian Public School, Salem, in association with The Hindu – Tamil Pen Indru.

Prize distribution

The treasure hunt will commence from Thiagarajar Polytechnic College at 7 a.m. Prize distribution will be held at Reliance Mega Mall at 6 p.m.

Women interested in taking part in the ‘Heels on Wheels’ contest can register their names by contacting mobile numbers: 9843174822 / 9894614147.

Spot registrations will be held between 7 a.m. and 8 a.m. Limited entries only.

The event is presented by The Indian Public School, Salem, and powered by Southern Medical Centre Hospital, Salem, activity partner - Young Indians, Salem Chapter, mall partner - Reliance Mega Mall and venue partner - Thiagarajar Polytechnic College, Salem.
title: The Hindu Heels on Wheels event today
